content: repeat 20 more times j oin in the 2nd chain of the ch3 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 22v-sts round 12 white join in the 1st double_crochet of any v-st ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in same st 1sc in the ch1-space 1sc in e ach of the next 2 sts repeat 21 more times omitting the last single_crochet join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 66sc 7 round 13 red join around the post of any fptrc from round 10 with a standing fptrc working in the st directly behind the fptrc just worked make 1sc 1sc in each of the next 10 sts fptrc around the post of the next fptrc from round 10 1sc in each of the next 11 sts making sure not to skip the st behind the fptrc repeat 4 more times join with a slip_stitch to the beginning fptrc do not fasten_off stitch c ount 6fptrc 66sc round 14 red note remember that the ch1 to close the popcorn is part of completing the popcorn and is not include d in the stitch count ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 4dc in same st and complete the popcorn st ch6 skip 5 sts 1 popcorn in the next st repeat 11 more times omitting the last popcorn join to the top of the beginn ing popcorn with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 12 popcorns 12 ch6-sps 8 round 15 green join in the top of any popcorn ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st working into the middle 3rd skip st from round 13 and in front of the chain from round 14 make a 3trc cluster 3sc around the chain from round 14 3trc cluster in the same st as the previous cluster 1sc in the top of the next popcorn repeat 11 more times omitting the last single_crochet join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fa sten off and secure ends stitch count 24x3trc clusters 48sc round 16 red note r emember that the ch1 to close the popcorn is part of completing the popcorn and is not included in the stitch count join in the 2nd single_crochet of the 3sc from round 15 with a standing double_crochet 4dc in same st and complete the popcor n st ch6 skip 5 sts 1 popcorn in the next st repeat 11 more times omitting the last popcorn join to the top of the beginning popcorn with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 12 popcorns 12 ch6-sps round 17 green join in the top of any popcorn ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st working into the middle 3rd skip st from round 15 and in front of the chain from round 16 make a 3trc cluster 3sc around the chain from round 16 3trc cluster in the same
